concepts.variables: A variable is a storage location identified by a name that can hold a value.
concepts.loops: A loop is a sequence of instructions that is continually repeated until a certain condition is reached.
concepts.functions: A function is a block of code that only runs when it is called.

exercises.title: Simple Variable Assignment
exercises.description: Assign a value to a variable and print it.

exercises.title: Creating a Loop
exercises.description: Write a loop that prints numbers from 1 to 5.
